ul.li: Click the join link found at the top of all ${siteName} web pages. A form will be displayed.
Fill in the necessary details, (only details marked with a red asterisk ‘*’ are mandatory) then click the next button.
A confirmation page will appear displaying the details you entered. You may return to the form by clicking the back button.

Click the submit button and presto you are registered with ${siteName}! Shortly after registration an email will be sent to you with a link which will enable you activate your ${siteName} account.
If you can't find the email in your inbox, check the spam folder
